page.title: 05LIVESTOCK FARMING IN HUMBIE
page.content: THERE ARE FIVE HUNDERED AND THIRTY EIGHT COWS IN OUR SQUARE.TWO HUNDRED OF THEM ARE AT POGBIE AND ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY AT UPPERKEITH.THE COWS AT THOSE FARMS ARE ABERDEEN ANGUS, CHARLOIS AND BULLOCKS. THERE ARE TWO THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED AND FIFTY SIX SHEEP IN OUR SQUARE.OVER TWO THOUSAND SHEEP ARE AT BLEGBIE AND FALA MAINS. THE BREEDS ARE BLACKIES,CHEVIOTS AND GREY FACE.THE MOST COMMON MARKET IS EDINBURGH WHICH HAS FOUR FARMERS GOING AND ST BOSWELLS WHICH HAS THREE FARMERS GOING FROM OUR AREA. MOST FARMERS GO TO MARKET ONCE A WEEK.
